title: Oster 11-Quart Flex Air Fryer Oven, Dual Air Fryer with 2 Cooking Zones, Double Air Fryer with 6 Cooking Functions, Large Air Fryer with 2 Frying Baskets
description: Ready for a new way to make family-size meals faster, easier, and tastier than ever before? The Oster® Flex Air Fryer Oven features multiple cook functions, letting you air fry, bake, grill, reheat, roast, and turbo crisp with one essential kitchen appliance. Two temperature independent 5.5-quart (5.5 L) zones function like two mini ovens. Cook food in both zones at the same time and temperature; or use the Match and Sync Function to cook two foods two ways, with both finishing at the same time. Plus it features a glass window, so you can monitor food while it cooks. The modular design has a removable partition to convert the dual air fryer ovens into a single 11-quart (11 L) oven, roomy enough for a whole chicken. Includes 8 dishwasher-safe accessories: 2 baskets, 2 mesh trays, 2 crumbs trays, 1 large roasting tray and 1 basket handle. An integrated storage drawer keeps accessories organized. Make appetizers, side dishes, main courses, even desserts in the Oster® Flex Air Fryer Oven
